tools.database
Class DataBaseSQLTool

java.lang.Object
  tools.database.DataBaseToolGen
      tools.database.DataBaseSQLTool

public class DataBaseSQLTool
extends DataBaseToolGen

Offers methods to connect / disconnect / update / insert (to) a SQL Database. e.g. create new entry for a new medium

Author:
Niels
